name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 8 relics.
- Requires Basemod, StSLib to run.

v0.4.0 - v0.4.2
- 3 new relics: FlyingFruit, Leftovers, Explorer's Path
- HP changed to 72 (was 64)
- Various text changes.
- Changes to list of Lesser Potions
- Buff: Centralize, Star Fruit, Flower Falling, Flower Shield, Gather Material, Herbalism, Polymorphism, Scent of Rosmari, Smart Maneuver, Solidify, Grow Book, Mind Search, Scroll of Purity, Lucky Clover
- Nerf: Enchant, Heart to Fruit
- Changed: Photoscythe, Upgrade Bag
- Rework: Misfortune, Recipe Change, Save Valuables, Poison Mastery

v0.4.3
- Bug fix: Drug Power, Scent of Rosmari, Grow Book, Mind Search

- For more information, visit
https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases
